FuncDef: The domain-location command configures the position of a domain name. The undo domain-location command restores the default position of a domain name. By default, the domain name in the AAA view is placed behind the domain name delimiter.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the domain name is placed behind the domain name delimiter.
-

Indicates that the domain name is placed before the domain name delimiter.
-

ExtraInfo: The format of a user name is user name@domain name. If before-delimiter is specified, the format domain name@user name is used.
